title: Line of Isis
description: Mermaids, magic and self-discovery.Now twenty, princess Maricella has spent years praying to find her magical Talent, the mark of passage into adulthood world of mermaids. But when dangers lurk in the human world, will she remain powerless to protect her people? Gabrielle is just another college graduate without a job. When her father's health fails, she is recruited as secretary at his top-secret lab on a deserted island. Awesome. Even better is when Gabi finds the truth about her father's experiments, which forces her to choose between her loyalty or her morality.
author: Sofia Wren
